channel.title: Need help makeing pets
channel.description:
ok, I am useing a Source called Boxingscape (317) so it would help if you knew stuff about that. Otherwise, if you know a little that might help me it would still be much aprieciated.
What i would like to know how to do:
Drop an item (ex. Kitten) That item becomes the npc (kitten) Then, that npc follwos you if you click the kitten npc's command that is pickup, it brings the item back into your inventory finally only you can pick it u
i have tried useing the summoning and custom npc tutorials but my blank source is kinda confusing (spat out liderally 100 errors when compiled) [code]if (droppedItem == 1556) { SummonNewNPC(716, "Kitten"); deleteItem(1556, getItemSlot(1556), 1); addSkillXP((0), 19); sM("You set your cat down"); return;[/code] im kinda new to codeing and only have the basics down so far. all i was realy able to make was some commands, npc spawns and shops really....
i just thought that this would make a really cool rare for my server. i would apreciate all the help i can get so please post some answers :P

item.title: Need help makeing pets
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:
@elatechris wrote:

Ya I meant editing at all since some sources have anti leech where they make their own errors
so you cant edit it and I’ve never added summoning so I cant be of much help soz m8 =(

Read full topic

item.title: Need help makeing pets
item.dc:creator: @Third_Law Third Law
item.description:
@Third_Law wrote:

elatechris:

when you tired to add summoning was that the very first thing you added?

what do you mean? if you mean had i not edited the sevrver at all before then no if you mean had i not added any other types of summoning or skilss then yes

Read full topic

item.title: Need help makeing pets
item.dc:creator: @elatechris elatechris
item.description:

when you tired to add summoning was that the very first thing you added?

item.title: Need help makeing pets
item.dc:creator: @Third_Law Third Law
item.description:
@Third_Law wrote:

TOMSCAPE BETA:

Then be clearer next time. Either remember the last thing you edited which produced these errors or post the class they are in.

lol? my compiler states “client.java” are you capable of reading a compiler?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Need help makeing pets
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Once you’ve started a statement, you need to end it. The code should be:

if (droppedItem == 1556) {                                
SummonNewNPC(716, "Kitten");                                
deleteItem(1556, getItemSlot(1556), 1);                                
addSkillXP((0), 19);   
sM("You set your cat down");          
}                   
return; // your call on this part.

@Third_Law wrote:

ok, I am useing a Source called Boxingscape (317) so it would help if you knew stuff about that. Otherwise, if you know a little that might help me it would still be much aprieciated.

What i would like to know how to do:

Drop an item (ex. Kitten)
That item becomes the npc (kitten)
Then, that npc follwos you
if you click the kitten npc’s command that is pickup, it brings the item back into your inventory
finally only you can pick it u

i have tried useing the summoning and custom npc tutorials but my blank source is kinda confusing (spat out liderally 100 errors when compiled)

if (droppedItem == 1556) { SummonNewNPC(716, "Kitten"); deleteItem(1556, getItemSlot(1556), 1); addSkillXP((0), 19); sM("You set your cat down"); return;
im kinda new to codeing and only have the basics down so far. all i was realy able to make was some commands, npc spawns and shops really…

i just thought that this would make a really cool rare for my server.
i would apreciate all the help i can get so please post some answers
